title: PSA: We Rengarmains actually DO NOT care about oneshotting

replies.body: The new Rengo Q is just stupid af.

Ms Hitman, 

When you say you do nor care about one-shotting, I do not believe you.

Rengar's old Q: why was it satisfying? Was it the big chunk of damage it did? It did nothing else so that must be it.

Hello.

First off, with those questions, you remind me of that one rioter he asked the same questions over and over and eventually answered with "Q:Nice meme", haha.

The old didn't lock you in place like the current Q does. That is not a very good thing for an assassin you know and not to mention it feels SO bad now compared to the old one. It also was an autoattack reset and felt fluid, AA-Q-AA felt quick and smooth. Another thing is that Rengar is an assassin with knives. You stab with knives and they are meant for single targetting, not for slashing several enemies at once. An assassin is also supposed to kill one squishy and be done with it. The new Q simply promotes a bruiser playstyle as it locks you in place. Also, it looked and sounded much better. Here is a meme which could open your eyes:

https://i.redd.it/718xo8twqvwy.png

That's all. Not the damage.

Diver*

To be honest I much more prefer him as one too. He makes so much more sense as a Diver especially with his current ult. His whole kit just screams diver even when he was initially released.

To be clear Diver's are capable of one-shotting too (see: {{champion:254}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:131}} ). The difference is that Divers become Skirmishers after they dive whereas Assassins dip out and wait for another opportunity.
But Nocturne is an Assassin remember? :)
Did they really label him as one? That's pretty silly cuz he has no way out after. Definitely a Diver.
Well, right now the most common Noc build is full semi-glass cannon AD and he is one of the few champions that can actually burst ADCs down in a timely manner, so it does sort of fit

Assassins kill and get out. Divers kill and stay in.

Nocturne is the latter, regardless of how you build him.

i dont understand you people, isnt diver a type of asassin?

Edit: ok now i see, they changed it , its a Fighter subclass not asassin, which also makes no sense to me eather :D

EDIT 2: lets give every class a  100 subclasses, that surely help to clarify things XD

Edit3 this is only sport i have heard of sublclases for, just imagine if we would have subclasses in lets say  football ,would it be something lik like this?  Kicker, subclass speeder, subclass durable subclass idiot ...no way out

To us normal people Assassin means someone that 100-0's someone right? Well in Riot's definition an Assassin is someone who 100-0's someone and **doesn't want to stay in the fight and has the tools to reliably get out.**

A Diver is someone who 100-0's someone and **does want to stay in the fight and lacks the tools to reliably get out.**

Add in nuances like Assassins are typically squishy and want to avoid runescape fights while Divers are typically tanky and don't mind runescaping it up and you have some class definition.
ty fot explanation^^ . I instantly feel 91 words smarter

They didn't rework him with Assasin Update because they labelled him Diver, now however, he's Assasin again. I think they intend on reworking him to stress Assasin more, not that he'd be much Assasiny now. Same with Evelyn. She is labelled Assasin, because though she was pushed way too much to Diver, they intend to rework her into Assasin.
He's an assassin because of his thematic alone.
They could label him support/mage but it changes nothing.
they labeled him as one becuase riot is stupid. also his escape capacity is pretty high against one target.
RIP {{champion:91}} W sound

No, old Q didnt lock you into place, but it was just a run-of-the-mill enhanced-auto ability that you can cancel your auto with. Is there anything really satisfying about having an auto reset like that? Theres no CC attached (like Leona), no stacking mechanism (Nasus), no gapcloser (Irelia). It really was just a boring auto reset, like Jax's W. But at least with Jax, you can do little tricks like get your ult-passive and W on the same auto for some surprising burst. 

That thing that Rengar carries isnt exactly a pocketknife. Its the size of his arm. You can slash, you can stab. Plus, its curved - its weird to think that a curved blade is used for stabbing. 

And lastly, Rengar is classified as a "Diver" not an "Assassin". His new Q is supposed to promote a bruiser playstyle, so thats not exactly a knock on his playstyle, is it?

Because first it interacts well with his passive allowing him to get auto resets and thus making brush jumping fluid, interesting and allows him to have some brush mechanics.

Second it fits the character, stabbing is something you would do with a knife you dont use it like you were swimming, you stab someone.

No it was the AS it gave it barely did any damage anyway :)

Nidalee's E gives attack speed too. She's not a DPS champion. Guess what they have in common? Jungling. Guess what supports clear speeds and healthy clears? Attack speed.

His new Q is only AOE for the very same reason. It also makes sense thematically. It's not just slashing - it's stabbing and tearing. It might feel clunky but it is a much more reasonable balancing lever than a triple auto reset.

He was never meant to be a DPS champion in any PvP scenario, period.

.... Seriously, you are compairing an AP champion with a small attack speed steroid to an AD champion with auto attack reseting, an increased AD steroid and a MUCH larger attack speed steroid..

And you say.. That doesn't sounds like dps to you? 
What. Lol

They were still reworked with the jungle kept in mind as their primary roles, and the attack speed was kept for Nidalee as part of her power budget.

I could make plenty of comparisons going on. Yi is a DPS champion with enhanced autos and a passive that supports that. Xin Zhao is a DPS champion with a kit that supports that. Fiora is a DPS champion with a passive that supports that and auto resets that enhance that. 

Riven? She's a skirmisher who fights with periodic burst. She's not DPS either but has the means to get out of combat and pad her passive again for combos; another keyword here. Rengar has combos. Yi doesn't. Xin doesn't. Fiora really doesn't either.

Rengar is about catching opponents and bursting them down, then getting out. The longer he is in a fight, the worse off he is.
Both Rengar and Nidalee started as solo laners, not junglers
